fields.name: Id
fields.description: The ARM id of the resource.

fields.name: ReasonForLogsStatus
fields.description: Reason for why the resource is sending logs (or why it is not sending).

fields.name: ReasonForMetricsStatus
fields.description: Reason for why the resource is sending metrics (or why it is not sending).

fields.name: SendingLogs
fields.description: Flag indicating if resource is sending logs to Dynatrace.

fields.name: SendingMetrics
fields.description: Flag indicating if resource is sending metrics to Dynatrace.
